subject: Football
lead_paragraph: GREEN BAY, Wis., Nov. 11 (AP) — One week after Adrian Peterson set an N.F.L. record with a 296-yard performance against San Diego, the Green Bay Packers held him to 45 yards on 11 carries Sunday before knocking him out of the game with a knee injury in the third quarter of a 34-0 rout of the Minnesota Vikings.
